alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and northeastern Lee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock Webb Wma to near Buckingham. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, Palmona Park, Babcock Webb Wma, Charlotte County Airport, Buckingham, Olga, Fort Myers Shores, North Fort Myers, Tropical Gulf Acres, Suncoast Estates, Harbour Heights, Cleveland, Tice, Lake Suzy, Solana, Fort Ogden and Charlotte Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota
